wikitext.*:
'''There and Back Again''' can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
===Books===
* '''''[[There and Back Again]]'', a book by [[Bilbo Baggins]].'''
==Real-world==
===Books===
* '''''[[The Hobbit|The Hobbit, or, There and Back Again]]'', the [[1937]] book by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].'''
* ''[[There and Back Again: An Actor's Tale]]'', a [[2004]] book by [[Sean Astin]].
* ''[[There and Back Again: In the Footsteps of J.R.R. Tolkien's England]]'', a 2004 book by Mathew Lyons.
* ''[[There and Back Again: J.R.R. Tolkien and the Origins of The Hobbit]]'', a 2012 book by Mark Atherton.

===Other===
* ''[[There and Back Again (map)|There and Back Again: A Map of Bilbo's Journey through Eriador and Rhovanion]]'', a map by [[Pauline Baynes]].
* ''[[John Howe: There and Back Again]]'', a [[2004]] documentary about [[John Howe]].
* ''[[Almost There And Back Again]]'', a [[2005]] fan film.
* ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies|The Hobbit: There and Back Again]]'', the working title of the third ''The Hobbit'' film by [[Peter Jackson]] before [[24 April]] [[2014]].
{{disambig}}
